title: I Am A Vampire
description: “Isn’t it simple? Just eat her!” Because of a ridiculous accident, I ended up becoming a damn vampire! But, and whether it’s a blessing or a curse... What I need to survive isn’t blood like the typical stereotype… For me I'm told there’s only one way for me to stay alive... And that's to become a predator and drain women of their vital essence!?
author: Lee Seong-Chi
